MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L31 postcode area of Liverpool affecting properties in Hesketh Drive, Bridge Farm Drive and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 10:41am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12 noon on 26th April 2021
